issue.title: orbit view focal point ray-tracing ignores object when inside bounding-box

content.raw: Actually it only ignores model links when you're inside the link's bounding box. It does not ignore the model when you're inside the model's bounding box. So this is mainly an issue with single link models like the polaris ranger at the moment or other models that have large complex links that leave a lot of free space in their bounding box.
content.html: Actually it only ignores model links when you're inside the link's bounding box. It does not ignore the model when you're inside the model's bounding box. So this is mainly an issue with single link models like the polaris ranger at the moment or other models that have large complex links that leave a lot of free space in their bounding box.
